title: RARE OPPORTUNITY RONEY PALACE IN ONE HOTEL!
posting_body: ['Directly on the ocean, Penthouse at Roney Palace.', 'Unfurnished.', 'Annual lease.', 'Rare opportunity for largest 2/2 at 1480 sq.', 'Ft.', 'Freshly painted, tile floors, expansive ocean view.', 'Sits right on the ocean with the best direct views, East, West and South spanning all of South Beach.', 'Enjoy city lights too.', 'The Roney Palace boasts 3 Heated oceanfront pools with complimentary chairs, umbrellas & towels.', 'Food & beverage service at pools.', 'Restaurants, bars, and cafe on site.', 'True resort Living.', '1 valet parking.', 'Washer & dryer in unit.', 'Brilliant ocean views from all rooms.', 'Bedrooms directly on the ocean.', 'Listen to the waves.', '1480 sq.', 'ft. Property home of 1 Hotel & Residences.', 'all units are one year lease min!', 'credit score close to 700 or higher required, proof of income 2,5 greater than rent price, first month + last month + security deposit to move in!', 'Dilya Taveras', 'Equity Realty', 'TEXT :', 'show contact info']
